cow.name: Bovine Transformation

bodyPartDescriptions.head: Your face has elongated into a bovine muzzle. Large, dark eyes with horizontal pupils stare back when you catch your reflection, and two small horns are pushing through your scalp.
bodyPartDescriptions.arms: Your hands have thickened and hardened, fingers fusing into clumsy hoof-like appendages. Black and white patches spread up your forearms, and your grip is nearly gone.
bodyPartDescriptions.body: Your torso has broadened unnaturally, spine curving forward. Black and white cowhide patterns cover your chest and stomach, and your clothes strain against the shifting bulk.
bodyPartDescriptions.legs: Your knees have reversed their bend, and your feet have hardened into heavy, cloven hooves. Walking upright is a constant struggle.

cow.advanceText: A wave of wrongness ripples through you. The Bovine Transformation tightens its grip, claiming more of your body.
cow.overwriteText: The Bovine Transformation surges with new strength, overwhelming another curse's hold on part of your body.

bee.name: Bee Transformation

bodyPartDescriptions.head: Your eyes have fragmented into hundreds of facets, giving you dizzying compound vision. Stubby antennae sprout from your forehead, twitching at every scent.
bodyPartDescriptions.arms: Your arms have thinned and hardened into chitinous limbs, joints bending at wrong angles. Fine hairs coat them, and your fingers have fused into pointed appendages.
bodyPartDescriptions.body: Bold yellow and black stripes band your torso like war paint. Translucent wings have budded from your shoulder blades, buzzing faintly when you move.
bodyPartDescriptions.legs: Your legs have segmented into insectoid limbs, thin and angular. They end in barbed hooks instead of feet, and they move with a twitchy, alien rhythm.

bee.advanceText: A maddening buzz fills your skull. The Bee Transformation spreads further, reshaping more of your body.
bee.overwriteText: The Bee Transformation swarms over another curse's territory, reclaiming part of your body with its droning hunger.

scarecrow.name: Scarecrow Transformation

bodyPartDescriptions.head: Your face has frozen into a stitched burlap rictus. Button eyes sit where yours used to be, and straw pokes out from beneath a battered hat that has fused to your scalp.
bodyPartDescriptions.arms: Your arms are wooden poles lashed with twine. Straw stuffing bulges from tears in your sleeves, and your fingers are brittle sticks that clatter when you move.
bodyPartDescriptions.body: Your torso is a canvas sack stretched over a wooden cross-frame. Straw bursts from every seam, and birds have started landing on your shoulders, mistaking you for the real thing.
bodyPartDescriptions.legs: Your legs are rough wooden posts, stiff and creaking. They move in jerky, puppet-like motions, and dry straw trails behind you with every step.

scarecrow.advanceText: Your joints seize with a wooden creak. The Scarecrow Transformation spreads, turning more of you into straw and timber.
scarecrow.overwriteText: The Scarecrow Transformation pushes outward with rigid force, replacing another curse's mark with its own hollow stillness.

ghost.name: Ghost Transformation

bodyPartDescriptions.head: Your head is translucent, features flickering like a candle in the wind. Your voice echoes from far away, and your eyes glow with a faint, spectral blue light.
bodyPartDescriptions.arms: Your arms phase in and out of visibility. Objects sometimes pass through your hands before you can grip them. A permanent chill radiates from your translucent fingers.
bodyPartDescriptions.body: Your torso is see-through, ribs and spine visible as faint outlines. Colors have drained away, leaving you in shades of gray and spectral blue. You feel weightless and hollow.
bodyPartDescriptions.legs: Your legs fade to mist below the knee, and you drift slightly above the ground. Frost forms on the floor where you pass, and your footsteps make no sound.

ghost.advanceText: An icy chill pierces your core. The Ghost Transformation seeps deeper, pulling more of you into the spirit world.
ghost.overwriteText: The Ghost Transformation washes over another curse's hold like a cold tide, claiming more of your fading form.

mouse.name: Mouse Transformation

bodyPartDescriptions.head: Your nose has stretched into a twitching pink snout, and your ears have grown large, round, and covered in fine fur. Long whiskers sprout from your cheeks, constantly quivering.
bodyPartDescriptions.arms: Your arms have shrunk, covered in soft brown fur. Your hands are tiny paws with delicate claws, barely able to grip anything larger than a seed.
bodyPartDescriptions.body: Your torso has compressed and rounded, covered in sleek brown fur. A long, naked pink tail extends from the base of your spine, curling and uncurling nervously.
bodyPartDescriptions.legs: Your legs have shortened into small, powerful haunches. Your feet are tiny pink paws that patter rapidly. You find yourself crouching low, ready to scurry at any noise.

mouse.advanceText: Your body twitches and shrinks. The Mouse Transformation gnaws at you, reducing more of your human form.
mouse.overwriteText: The Mouse Transformation scurries over another curse's claim, small but relentless, replacing it with fur and whiskers.

zombie.name: Zombie Transformation

bodyPartDescriptions.head: Your skin has gone gray and slack, hanging loosely from your skull. One eye drifts lazily, and your jaw keeps unhinging with a wet click. You groan instead of speaking.
bodyPartDescriptions.arms: Your arms are bloated and stiff, the color of rotten meat. Fingers curl into clumsy claws, and something green oozes from a split in your forearm. You can still move them, but they smell terrible.
bodyPartDescriptions.body: Your torso has swollen and gone the color of a bruised plum. Your shirt strains over distended ribs, and a persistent stench of spoiled pork follows you everywhere. Flies circle.
bodyPartDescriptions.legs: Your legs have gone rigid and waterlogged, bending at wrong angles with each lurching step. Your gait is a shambling shuffle, and one knee keeps trying to bend backward.

zombie.advanceText: A wave of rot washes through you. The Zombie Transformation creeps further, claiming more of your body with its putrid grip.
zombie.overwriteText: The Zombie Transformation oozes over another curse's hold, replacing it with bloated, shambling decay.

spider.name: Spider Transformation

bodyPartDescriptions.head: Your eyes have split into a cluster of eight, gleaming like black pearls across your forehead. Tiny fangs have descended from your upper jaw, dripping with a faintly luminous venom.
bodyPartDescriptions.arms: Two extra pairs of limbs have erupted from your sides, thin and chitinous, ending in sharp, hooked claws. Your original arms have darkened and hardened, covered in coarse bristles.
bodyPartDescriptions.body: Your abdomen has swollen into a bulbous, silk-producing spinneret sac. Dark, glossy chitin plates have replaced the skin across your back, and fine threads of webbing trail from your every movement.
bodyPartDescriptions.legs: Your legs have lengthened and segmented into eight spindly, jointed limbs. They move in an unsettling, skittering rhythm, and sticky silk pads on their tips let you cling to any surface.

spider.advanceText: A prickling wave crawls across your skin. The Spider Transformation spins deeper into you, binding more of your body in its web.
spider.overwriteText: The Spider Transformation creeps over another curse's hold, wrapping it in silk and claiming the territory with patient, venomous hunger.
